name: Clouping
overview:
Clouping is the online collection of your favorite websites and your starting point on the internet.

Advanced, Visual, Discover Clouping provides you with an advanced and visual way to organize your interests and the websites you like. It brings you new ways of getting in touch with others who share the same interests. Access to information is quick, direct and fun. Discover places and websites on the Internet you have never been before!

Bookmarks and Favorites reinvented! Clouping enables you to organize the websites you like, in the way you like. You can make your own groups of websites, publish them and make them your start point on the internet. Clouping just reinvented the bookmarks and favorites for you!

Fresh and fully readable screenshots All websites and groups you make will be available to you from any PC that is connected to the internet. Clouping maintains and refreshes actual screenshots of every website you add; your favorite websites will allways be zero click or just one click away! The Clouping Screenshots are fully readable and provide you with actual links to their origin.
